Header: Student killed in Malabe road accident
Content: A student has been killed in a road accident that occurred in Thalahena, Malabe. Police say that the accident had occurred while the girl was going home with her father on a motorcycle on Sunday afternoon. The motorcycle had collided with a tipper and following which the victim was run over by it. Police added that the victimâ€™s father had not sustained any injuries. The girl was a resident of Pahala Bomiriya.
